text.title: Dinner Cuisine Network Map
text.intro: Network map of foods using terms extracting from the USDA food nutrition database and 10 years of real American dinners survey data (30,000+ meals). Survey data is What We Eat In America, collated data releases from 2000-2010. The clusters were learned on the descriptions of the dinner food items using word2vec. word2vec is a machine learning program that uses the continuous Skip-gram model and neural networks to create feature vectors for words that describe their relative relationships.
